text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @SenateGOP @HouseGOP @senatemajldr you all have no idea what this movement is, because you are all living in the 60’s. YOU are the TOXIC MONUMENTS that need to be taken down! Why haven’t you talked about this pig? COVID19 #TuesdayThoughts https://t.co/FHNWT5rzia
